thread.title: Amazing staff and lovely hotel!
thread.title_full: Amazing staff and lovely hotel! - Review of Hotel Eiffel Segur, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Leaheveanna
title: Amazing staff and lovely hotel!
text: Visited Paris for the first time with my friend and loved it. This hotel was amazing the staff were so friendly and helped with all of our needs advising us on the best routes to take and how to get to different places. The hotel is lovely with a central location 10 minutes walk away from the eiffel tower and just across from the train station. Loved our stay and would defiantly visit again!
